info.abstract: The AI Lesson Scoring component gives users the OpenAI's responses to the text answers of a selected lesson. The OpenAI's response includes a score and a rationale for the scoring. We are using OpenAI gpt-3.5-turb-instruct engine.
info.description: This component gives users OpenAI's response to text answer for selected lessons. The OpenAI's response includes a score and a rationale for the scoring.

ul.li: A CSV file that contains a column of text answers for the OpenAI to score. Required
The CSV file that has OpenAI's scores and rationales.
Column to Score: the column that contains the text answers for OpenAI to score.
Predict or Explain: choose from Predict or Explain.
API Key: use OpenAI's site to get an API key. API key can be viewed when you shared your WF with others.
